website_summaries.verdict: Contains iridescent pearl drops to diffuse light and argan oil for hydration, as well as plant-based skin nutrients plus vitamin E.
pros: Gives foundation a subtle, shimmering, dewy look
It's extremely versatile and can also be used as a morning or evening moisturizer
It also has a calming lavender scent
cons: Not everyone was a fan of the scent
Some users thought that the shimmer looked too greasy on the skin

customer_reviews.title: It’s good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I actually really love this product. I’m on a mission to save my face. I’m in my 40’s and keep seeing women in my age of life and older with this beautiful shine to their faces. I’ve literally been on a quest to figure out how to get my skin to look like this! One day I was talking to a friend (who has that shine), and she told me her skincare regime. I bought everything she uses and have found that these drops are the secret ingredient to that glow!! I mix a few drops with my moisturizer every morning and night. It really is my favorite of all the new products I started using.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My favorite argan oil and it has the freshest cleanest smell! Also, leave a little shimmer glow

product_meta.title: Josie Maran Argan Moonstone Drops - Give Your Skin an Instant Brighter and Nourishing Look (50 ml/1.7 fl oz)
feature_bullets: A nourishing multi-benefit priming and highlighting oil powered by 100% Pure Argan Oil Light and iridescent pearls for glowing, moonlit, makeup-ready skin.
Josie Maran has designed Moonstone Drops specifically for the face, to give it a beautiful lit from within glow.
Glowing skin is the look of healthy skin. This will give you that bright, supple, juicy effect that you are looking for.

Josie Maran believes in cosmetics with a conscience. That is why Moonstone Drop is cruelty free, vegan, paraben free, sulfate free, gluten free, phthalate free, synthetic fragrance free, mineral oil free, formaldehyde free, and peg free.
100% Pure Argan Oil Light, Lavender Essential Oils, and Coated Priming Pearls illuminate and brighten for a soft-focus, moonlit glow
